AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO.  05  / 2012 
 
 
 
Subject:      Access of Vehicle upto the aircraft at civil airports in the  
                  country  on  protocol /security / medical grounds.  
 
 
        
Please refer to this Bureau AVSEC Circular No.09/2011  dated 
22/02/2011, on the subject mentioned above.  
 
02. 
Shri S.Jaipal Reddy, Hon’ble Minister for Petroleum & Natural Gas, is 
permitted to avail facility of Airport Operator’s ferry vehicle to and from aircraft, 
during arrival and departure at all civil airports in the country on medical grounds 
for  further period of one year w.e.f 31/01/2012. 
 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (Civil 
Aviation).  
 
 
 
 ( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )
